text: Hello Y’all! I’m Jorge Rodri from NC in USA! Go Heels! :ram:… I’m a full-stack developer and just recently accepted a position where some of our projects are in HubSpot and I’m looking for best practices to make my development more productive and easier to transition from a more traditional development shop. I do React/Redux, Express, Mongo, Rails. So if you want to talk about these or other technologies please send me a message. Excited to learn more!!

Hey, welcome in Jorge! Always happy to see another full-stack oriented dev in here. If you ever need any translation for where certain things may be in HubSpot, feel free to reach out :slightly_smiling_face: Like Rails, HubSpot is pretty opinionated, so there are only certain ways to do certain things, but once you learn those developing on it gets pretty fast and simple.
<@U22PKFRU5> So far so good!  I still am learning and trying to learn it all!
Amazing - glad to hear it's going well. Feel free to ask questions and collaborate in this slack as you're learning - We're all here to help
HI GANG! All about me --> <https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-cornelis/>  It's my first HubSpot site but I've implemented countless CMSs... looks legit :sunglasses::+1:
